1100000011001111 0100000000001111 1 -> sum: 0000000011011111, cout: 1
0000100101010010 0111111000100100 1 -> sum: 1000011101110111, cout: 0
1011110000001010 1000110110111011 1 -> sum: 0100100111000110, cout: 1
1001101100111001 0001110011011001 1 -> sum: 1011100000010011, cout: 0
0111000100011000 0101101111000010 0 -> sum: 1100110011011010, cout: 0
0011011010011000 1010110101001110 1 -> sum: 1110001111100111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
